name: Skate Guy
description:
Web Version (Needs Opera GX) https://gxc.gg/games/wic4h9/Skate-Guy

Made in a day, this game was the offspring of not having enough time for our first idea and realizing that with only 10 hours left in the jam.

Skate Guy is trying to get some sick air time; see how long you can stay in the air and delay the inevitable pull of gravity!

_____

Use any button to play

Hold to tilt your skateboard up to slow yourself down

While not holding you will descend faster

hold (for menus) = select

Press (for menus) = select different button

_____

Release on an object to parry yourself higher

Parry closer to the top of an object to boost yourself higher than usual

_____

Made by pikachurian, MC_Creeper, and Kirbybowwow
